mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client_model (model_id, api_id, model_name, model_type, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{modelId}, #{apiId}, #{modelName}, #{modelType}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, model_id, api_id, model_name, model_type, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_model ORDER BY id

#{clientId}
